title: Rg = rate for land in Rs
clause_text: Rg = rate for land in Rs. per Sq.m. as per A.S.R. of generating plots in generating year. Rr = rate for land in Rs. per Sq.m. as per A.S.R. of receiving plot in generating year.
section: It shall be permissible to utilize the Slum T.D.R. in any land use zone as per given formula below, subject to restrictions as mentioned in clause 5 & 6 herein above. Formula ; X = (Rg / Rr) x Y

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Rg = rate for land in Rs. per Sq.m. as per A.S.R. of generating plots in generating year. Rr = rate for land in Rs. per Sq.m. as per A.S.R. of receiving plot in generating year.
